key_message: Wireshark is a microscope (analysis); Sentinel is a CCTV camera (monitoring). They serve different phases of security.
Encryption protects data, not infrastructure. Attacks like Evil Twin, Deauth, and Downgrade attacks bypass WPA3 encryption entirely.
Architected with Queue-based Producer-Consumer pattern. Heavy lifting can be offloaded to C-based Tshark. Validated for Edge/SME throughput.
Targeting the 90% of businesses (SMEs) that cannot afford Enterprise WIPS. Providing an Open platform for Education/Research training.
